scripts.build: if [ ! -d "$HOME/flutter" ]; then git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git -b stable --depth 1 $HOME/flutter; fi && $HOME/flutter/bin/flutter build web --release && cp web/game.html build/web/ && cp web/game.js build/web/ && cp web/mobile.html build/web/ && cp web/mobile.js build/web/
